thread.title: Yash, Rakshit Shetty meet SRK in hospital
thread.title_full: Yash, Rakshit Shetty meet SRK in hospital - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Yash, Rakshit Shetty meet SRK in hospital
text:
Fans of the Century Star, and his film colleagues, have a spent tense couple of days after the actor was rushed to hospital on Tuesday morning, after complaining of chest pain.
He was shifted to Mallya Hospital, and as news of Shivarajkumar's ill health spread like wildfire, the actor's fans and friends from the industry made a beeline for the hospital.
The who's who of the Kannada industry, like V Ravichandaran Yash, Prem, Tara, Sudharani, Ragini Dwivedi, Rakshit Shetty and Imran Sardhariya, among others, called on Shivarajkumar, while others spoke to him and wife Geetha over the phone.
